channel.title: 3 problems
channel.description: 1. i have a good server but there are tons of enemies in varrok center and i cant get rid of them. 2. the xp rate is to fast and i cant find where to cahnge it. 3 when you die you go to castlewars instead of bank. if you no the answer to the problems please help me in the reply just say "the anser to problem _ is ......

item.title: 3 problems

item.description:

v3 you cant have fire capes, infinity , fury’s, you can only use these crapy ones like barrows and dragon thats about it any other items crashes the server, and i think thats gay…
so use testscape or something…

item.title: 3 problems
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

ok 1 dont use project 16 v3 use v4.5 or something v3 is crap…

this is the awsner to problem 2…

ok open client java…you all no what it is i hope

and search:

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate

then you should see sumthing like dis under it

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); } else if (FightType == 5 || FightType == 6 || FightType == 7) { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerRanged); } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double)400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(200 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); actionTimer = 7; }Change the 400 to sumthing like 

50000

or what ever you want, leveling your attack str n def has never been easyer/harder

enjoy,Tele

Read full topic

item.title: 3 problems
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

The Awnser to problem one is…

ok first off go into your npc.java list not the regular notepad but the npc notepad with a white paper behind it, then look for the npc that you dont want, and just delete it, but when you delete it remember to change the numbers back in order…

ill get back to you on the 2 other errors…
